summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to City employment, to be known as the Third Quarter 2006 Salary Ordinance, establishing new titles and salaries; specifying administration for a title; authorizing the execution of a Letter of Agreement between the City of Seattle and the International Federation of Professional and Technical Engineers, Local 17 and establishing new titles and/or salaries retroactive to 2003 associated with the Permit Specialist classification series consistent with the Letter of Agreement; designating certain positions as exempt from, and returning one position to, Civil Service status; all by a 2/3 vote of the City Council.
